name: Dark Ties - The Ascent
description:
A little old school first person shooter made for an university project. .

Your objective is to the mechanics given to you to defeat the boss and win the game, explore your abilities and strategies and have fun.

Made by:

Tiago Castro (me) - Development / Concept Art/ All assets/visuals (models, animations, VFX, shaders, sounds, UI)

Roberto Rodrigues - Development / Main Programmer (Player mechanics)

José Santos - Development / Main Programmer (AI and enemies)
